body.p:
4th 1
Adjutant General's Office,
Washington, December 23d, 1861.
To His Excellency,
The Governor of Kentucky.
Sir:
I have the honor to report, that the following named Officers of the Volunteer forces from the State of Kentucky have resigned, to take effect at the dates set opposite their respective names, viz:

I am, Sir
Very respectfully
Your Obt. Servant.
Geo, S, Ruggles,
Asst. Adjt. General

War Department
Adjutant Generals Office
Washington D. C
Decr 23d 1861
Ruggles. Tho. D
A. A. Gen
Reports the following officers of Ky regiments resigned to take effect the date opposite their names. viz -- Capt Peter H Hiatt. 4th Regt Decr 8" 1861 1st Lt Jno H Combs. 9th Regt Decr 11th 1861.
